page.title: 18SHOPPING IN NE. PLYMOUTH
page.content: In our survey we found people buying everything in one shop.Most people shop once a week.The shops employ many from the estates. Each housing estate has groups of small shops.{Estover}has a large supermarket called Asda.Free buses bring people from other estates to Asda.Nearly everyone said "The food & petrol is cheaper."They find the large free carpark useful.Other shops: Chemist,Newsagents,Betting Shop,Chippy {Crownhill}has a busy shopping area.The shops are small and not modern.The small supermarkets used the most.The only banks are here,4,with long queues at the automatic bank.At{Fort Austin the Keep has been turned into a D.I.Y. cash'n'carry.The small baker's shop in {Eggbuckland}specialises in Greek confectionary.
